text:
@CAPAction @Alyssa_Milano Yeah of course unemployment is high. When people are NOT ALLOWED to work, what do you expect, idiot?

Stop encouraging black people to protest if the coronavirus is so deadly to them as well . You’re the biggest hypocrite I see on the internet
